<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
	<style>
		.box {
			
			width: 200px;
			height: 400px;
			background: url("data:image/png;base64,") no-repeat;
      background-size: auto;
			left: 10px;
			right: 10px;
			display: inline-block;
		}

		.box:hover {
			background: url("data:image/png;base64,") no-repeat;
      background-size: auto;
      
		}
	</style>

</head>

<body>

	<div class="box"> </div>
	<p> This is a paragraph. </p>

</body>

</html>
